descriptions.en: Much remains unknown about this Pokémon, as few have ever seen it. However, we know that it is calm and dislikes conflict, and it enjoys polishing its face against trees and rocks.
descriptions.ja: 太古の　地層から　化石が 見つかるが　顔の　部分　以外が 発見　されたことは　ない。
descriptions.it: Fossili di questo Pokémon sono stati trovati in strati geologici antichissimi. Tuttavia, gli unici resti pervenuti costituiscono parti del muso.
descriptions.es: Los fósiles que se han encontrado hasta ahora en estratos prehistóricos pertenecen solo a su cara.
descriptions.de: Man findet zwar in uralten Erdschichten Fossilien dieses Pokémon, aber meist handelt es sich dabei nur um Teile des Gesichts.
descriptions.fr: On retrouve des fossiles de Dinoclier dans les couches sédimentaires préhistoriques, mais seule sa tête a résisté à l’épreuve du temps.
descriptions.ko: 태고의 지층에서 화석이 발견되었지만 얼굴 이외의 부분이 발견된 적은 없다.
